title: Alyssa Wong
text:
Alyssa Wong is an <a href="Americans">American</a> writer of <a href="speculative%20fiction">speculative fiction</a>, <a href="comics">comics</a>, poetry, and <a href="Video%20game%20writing">games</a>. Wong is a recipient of the <a href="Nebula%20Award">Nebula Award</a>, <a href="World%20Fantasy%20Award">World Fantasy Award</a>, and <a href="Locus%20Award">Locus Award</a>.
Wong studied fiction at <a href="North%20Carolina%20State%20University">North Carolina State University</a>, graduating in 2017 with a <a href="Master%20of%20Fine%20Arts">Master of Fine Arts</a>. In July 2018, Wong was hired by <a href="Blizzard%20Entertainment">Blizzard Entertainment</a> as a writer on "<a href="Overwatch%20%28video%20game%29">Overwatch</a>". Wong is the writer for <a href="Marvel%20Comics">Marvel Comics</a>'s <a href="Doctor%20Aphra">Doctor Aphra</a> <a href="Star%20Wars">Star Wars</a> comic series scheduled for release in April 2020.
